title: Understanding Curanderismo
text: Curanderismo is a traditional healing practice that has been passed down through generations, especially in Hispanic communities. It combines various elements of spirituality, herbal medicine, and rituals.

title: Key Elements of Curanderismo
text: This practice emphasizes the balance of mind, body, and spirit. It often involves the use of natural remedies and spiritual guidance to promote healing.

hintAnswer: a holistic practice rooted in beliefs that health is achieved through the right balance of mind, body, and spirit
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes curanderismo?
choices: Health outcomes that are influenced by these social determinants of health and therefore represent preventable differences experienced by underrepresented individuals
the various medicines and healing practices around the world that differ from the modern, Western $$health-care$$ system
a holistic practice rooted in beliefs that health is achieved through the right balance of mind, body, and spirit
